Mundur Dari Kepala Bappeda DKI, Sri Mahendra Jadi Widyaiswara
01 Nov 2019, 18:50 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Kepala Badan Perencanaan dan Pembangunan Daerah (Bappeda) DKI Jakarta Sri Mahendra menyatakan mundur dari jabatannya. Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan mengatakan Mahendra akan kembali menjadi widyaiswara.
"Pak Hendra akan kembali menjadi widyaiswara seperti posisi beliau sebelumnya," ujar Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Jl Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Diketahui, widyaiswara merupakan PNS yang diangkat sebagai pejabat fungsional. Adapun tugasnya adalah mendidik, mengajar, atau melatih PNS dalam lembaga pendidikan dan pelatihan pemerintah.
Anies menyebutkan saat ini posisi Mahendra akan diisi oleh Suharti sebagai Plt Kepala Bappeda. Menurut Anies, Suharti memiliki pengalaman di bidang perencanaan.
"Kepala Bappeda atau Plt Kepala Bappeda akan dipegang oleh Ibu Suharti, Deputi Gubernur Bidang Pengendalian Penduduk dan Pemukiman," kata Anies.
"Ibu Suharti adalah seorang yang yang berpengalaman di bidang perencanaan. Beliau secara kepegawaian, yang berasal dari Bappenas, menjadi Kepala Perencanaan di Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan," sambungnya.

Withdrawal from the Head of DKI Bappeda, Sri Mahendra Becomes Widyaiswara
Nov 01 2019, 18:50 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Head of DKI Jakarta Regional Planning and Development Agency (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra has resigned from his post. DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan said Mahendra would again become a widyaiswara.
"Mr. Hendra will return to being a lecturer like his previous position," said Anies at the Jakarta City Hall, Jl Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
It is known, widyaiswara is a civil servant who was appointed as a functional official. The task is to educate, teach, or train civil servants in government education and training institutions.
Anies said that currently Mahendra's position would be filled by Suharti as Acting Head of Bappeda. According to Anies, Suharti has experience in the planning field.
"The Head of Bappeda or Acting Head of Bappeda will be held by Mrs. Suharti, Deputy Governor for Population and Settlement Control," Anies said.
"Ms. Suharti is a person who has experience in the planning field. She is staffed, who is from Bappenas, being the Head of Planning at the Ministry of Education and Culture," he continued.
